SESSION_ID.description: your session id. get session here https://tohid-ai-pair1-a0c7bc9ba92a.herokuapp.com/

PREFIX.description: put any one symbol here except @ and + , leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

HKEY.description: Put your Heroku api key Here , Get one from here https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HAPP.description: Put the Heroku app name, same as above entered

statusview.description: make it true if you want bot to view status

autoRead.description: make it true or false if you want bot to read messages leave it blank if you don't want it to read messages

WELCOME_MSG.description: make it true or false if you want bot to Send welcome message when someone joins a group

GOODBYE_MSG.description: make it true or false if you want bot to Send goodbye message when someone leaves a group

ANTILINK.description: make it true or false if you want bot to delete group links sent in groups. of you are admin

AUTO_RECORDING.description: make it true or false. true to activate false to deactivate

AUTO_TYPING.description: make it true or false. true to activate false to deactivate

AUTO_STATUS_LIKE.description: make it true or false. true to activate false to deactivate

AUTO_STATUS_LIKE_EMOJI.description: customize to any emoji you need üíö

STATUS_REPLY.description: make it true or false. true to activate false to deactivate

STATUS_MSG.value: TOHID-AI BOT SUCCESSFULLY VIEWED YOUR STATUS üíñüíö

antidelete.description: bot will forward deleted messages if you make it true
